## Description and Rationale

Doing this as a final project as a part of the ML with Graphs course (CS224W) at Stanford.

## Details

* Type: Academia
* Country: United States

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(gt)

gt(tibble::tribble(
  ~id, ~forename,      ~surname,          ~affiliation,
   1L,    "Neha", "Balamurugan", "Stanford University",
   2L,   "Silky",       "Singh", "Stanford University",
   3L, "Mahmood",  "Alhusseini", "Stanford University"
  )
) |>   cols_label(id = md("**ID**"), forename = md("**Forename**"), surname ~ md("**Surname**"), affiliation ~ md("**Affiliation**"))
```
